thread.title: Donald Trump tweets photo of tax returns
thread.title_full: Donald Trump tweets photo of tax returns - CNNPolitics.com

author: Jedd Rosche
title: Donald Trump tweets photo of tax returns
text:
Washington (CNN) There's only one way to describe Donald Trump's tax returns: Huge.
The billionaire businessman, who loves to remind his opponents and his followers how rich he is, tweeted a photo Thursday of himself signing multiple sheets of papers that appear to be tax forms, one stack of which piles from the desk to above Trump's head out of the frame.
"Signing my tax return....," he said in the tweet .
Signing my tax return.... pic.twitter.com/XJfXeaORbU
â€” Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 15, 2015 The message comes the same day as another 2016 hopeful, former Florida Gov. Jeb Bush, is planning to release his tax returns .
Trump has repeatedly called for simplifying the tax code, citing his own complicated taxes as an example of federal government bureaucracy run amok.
Read More RELATED: Donald Trump unveils plan to slash taxes for the poor -- and the wealthy
